name: Pirates (Rafael Gonzalez)
description:
Description

Proof of concept top-down pirate ship shooter. Be mindful of your orientation to the wind: it will affect your speed!

Controls

  • A - Turn left
  • D - Turn right
  • Left CTRL / Mouse Click – Shoot left
  • Left ALT / Right Mouse Click – Shoot right
  • ESC – Pause

Credits

  • Assets
    • Background Elements Redux from Kenney Game Assets 3
    • Pirate Pack from Kenney Game Assets 2
    • Interface Pack from Kenney Game Assets 3
  • Game Engine
    • Unity
  • Libraries
    • Unity3D-TextureAtlasSlicer from toxicFork
